title: Root:1 Wine
content:
Hi Kids,

I cannot for the life of me figure out this font. I’ve used identifont.com, typefinder (the book) and my own knowledge to figure this out.

It meanders somewhere between Baskerville and Caslon.

Any help?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080202210555im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/root_1_sauvignon_blanc_2006_4783.jpg)

 [‹ Roamfree.com Ad type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080202210555/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41466 "Go to previous forum topic") [Multiple Fonts? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080202210555/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41458 "Go to next forum topic")
author: concentrateanda...

comments.content:
from the good folks at Emigre:

[http://emigre.com/EF.php?fid=109](http://web.archive.org/web/20080202210555/http:/emigre.com/EF.php?fid=109 "http://emigre.com/EF.php?fid=109")

You guys are kidding me.

It’s one of my favorite fonts!
